thread.title: H.S. football: Offensive Player of the Year watch - Football
thread.title_full: H.S. football: Offensive Player of the Year watch - Football - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: H.S. football: Offensive Player of the Year watch - Football
text:
Offensive Player of the Year watch 
Peter Guerriero, Lyndhurst, sr. QB
Produced over 250 rushing yards for the second straight game with a 21-carry, 264-yard, four-TD performance in the Golden Bears' win against Harrison. Ran for 748 yards and eight TDs on 78 carries in four games.
Jarrett Guarantano, Bergen Catholic, sr. QB
Connected on 22 of 37 passes for 274 yards and two TDs to help the Crusaders defeat Paramus Catholic. Has completed 71 percent of his passes (103 of 146) for 1,268 yards, nine TDs and just one interception.
Nick Goodwin, Wayne Valley, sr. QB
Gained 121 yards and scored three TDs on 12 attempts, and threw a TD pass in the Indians' win over West Milford. Through four games, has rushed for 560 yards and 10 TDs on 44 carries and completed 65 percent of his passes for 544 yards, seven TDs.
Kevin Kosakowski, Rutherford, jr. RB
Rushed for 226 yards and six TDs on 18 carries, caught a TD pass in the Bulldogs' victory over Palisades Park/Leonia. Has rushed 44 times for 391 yards and nine TDs in three games.
Derius Stone, St. Mary, sr. RB
Gained 163 yards and scored on the ground and caught a TD pass in the Gaels' win vs. Wallington. Has 765 rushing yards, 13 TDs on 100 carries in four games.
